flawed_nl_solution:
In total, the 3 tea leaf plants have 18 x 3 = <<18*3=54>>54 green leaves.
One-third of the yellow leaves falling off of all plants is 54 / 3 = <<54/3=18>>18.
The number of remaining green leaves on the plants is 54 - 18 = <<54-18=63>>63.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36.0, not 63.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
